# placeholderAttributedString

**Instance Property**

The attributed string the text field displays when empty to help the user understand the text field’s purpose.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var placeholderAttributedString: NSAttributedString? { get set }
```

## Setting Placeholder Text

- **placeholderString**: The string the text field displays when empty to help the user understand the text field’s purpose.
